tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE trading_behavior (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    transaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE trades (
    trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    stock_symbol VARCHAR,
    quantity INT,
    price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name TEXT,
    last_name TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    registration_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE user_transactions(
  user_id UUID,
  transaction_id UUID,
  symbol VARCHAR,
  amount DECIMAL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE trade_analysis(
  trade_id UUID,
  user_id UUID,
  symbol VARCHAR,
  action VARCHAR,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
CREATE TABLE traders ( trader_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, trader_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, trader_location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, registration_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE trades ( trade_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, trader_id UUID REFERENCES traders(trader_id), stock_symbol VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, trade_type VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, trade_quantity INTEGER NOT NULL, trade_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL, trade_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE market_data ( symbol VARCHAR(10) PRIMARY KEY, stock_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, exchange VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, market_cap DECIMAL(20, 2) NOT NULL, industry VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE transactions ( transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, trade_id UUID REFERENCES trades(trade_id), trader_id UUID REFERENCES traders(trader_id), transaction_type VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, transaction_amount DECIMAL(20, 2) NOT NULL, transaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE analytics ( analysis_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id UUID REFERENCES transactions(transaction_id), trader_id UUID REFERENCES traders(trader_id), trade_id UUID REFERENCES trades(trade_id), analysis_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, analysis_result JSONB NOT NULL, analysis_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL );
